title: Profit of leading mutual property/casualty insurance companies 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Insurance Companies in the x axis and Profit in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Profit in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and lowest at Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
There is a difference of 8717.9 between the maximum Insurance Companies State Farm Insurance Cos. and minimum Insurance Companies Farmers Insurance Exchange.
